title: Game-Based Collaborative Scientific Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Enhancing scientific problem-solving competencies in a gamified environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Students can explain over 80% of scientific principles through experimental data via game-based tasks
Through collaborative learning among team members, creative problem-solving strategies are proposed in over 90% of assignments
By utilizing gamification elements (points, badges, leaderboards), over 70% of learners maintain voluntary participation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
